title: LoL client not responding and crashing
body: Just happened recently, I  found the lol client on my new computer (windows 10) crashed easily and often not responding during the queue and sometime crashed in the loading page. This gave me a bad game experience because many time my client crashed in loading page and system just judge me as AFK and put me in lower priority queue.

replies.body:
Random crashes with the client are often caused by your client losing its connection to the game platform service. These are often the result of local network settings that conflict with League. I recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure these settings are all up to snuff.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

My problem is that it crashes and not responding in the main page (not in the game). And mostly in the loading page of the game(100% or 'Not connectedâ€˜. And today two games in a row my screen just froze for no reason and won't recover. (can't alt f4 either,not shown disconnected in the game).
It definitely sounds like something going on with your connection to the server. Did those steps in the connection guide cause any changes?
